name: Veleda - For Josiane and my dear Germani
name_original: Veleda - For Josiane and my dear Germani
description:
Visual novel comedy about 1st Century Germania and also, a goat. 

This is in english even if the screenshots are in French. New ones coming soon.

Play as Wafflid, the unlovable assistant of Veleda. Discover the secret of the prophecies, who is Josiane and other "terrible" secrets.

Duration: ~ 20 min

---------

This is the english translation of the game, you can find the original french version here: https://tombuston.itch.io/vnveleda

---------

Awards : Best Scenario & Best Game, ISART Digital 2017
